timeline.message:
PatientLinkBuilder

- No paging support
- All tests passing

Fix total

- Work around HAPI 1985 issue
- Add QueryLogListener
Added an operation to seach by coverage contract

timeline.bodyText: New type of DB query for our logs.
timeline.author: RickHawesUSDS

timeline.bodyText: Renamed PageLinkBuilder but otherwise, it works the same as before.

timeline.bodyText: I'm initializing with a string vs RequestDetail because it makes it easier to test the class.
